txt.en: Salves can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should gather salves for wounded soldiers.

'I have known war, but I am not a warrior. No, I have always been, and will always be, a builder and a sailor of ships. And yet the call to war must be heeded, so I brought to the Great Alliance my skills as a healer and a bringer of wisdom.\n\n'I have seen more injured soldiers of late, a greater number than I am accustomed to treating at once. You have some skill tending to the wounded? That is good. I ask you to collect some salves and see to these injured soldiers. Your assistance will be greatly appreciated by both healers and healed alike.'
Círdan can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should talk to Círdan.

'Did your skill at healing prove up to the challenge, and the wounded begin to recover? Good. I am glad to hear their injuries fade and their spirits improve. Let not this gift of yours go to waste during the years of the siege!'
Wounded soldiers can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should tend to the wounded soldiers.
Círdan has seen many injured over the years. Currently, many of those wounded remain untreated.
